title: Dapper on Congo religion - historical context

content.question: Which of the following cultural practices provides the most useful context for understanding the development described by the author?

choices.label: Migration triggered by population growth contributed to cultural change.
Linguistic diversity caused by trade led to the exchange of cultural traditions.
Religious change and continuity fostered syncretism through cultural blending.
Enslavement contributed to the diasporic process, which spread culture globally.

content.answer: Religious change and continuity fostered syncretism through cultural blending.
